name: Rogue Rider
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Producer : S. Selmoune Game Design & Programming : G. Carabeufs, A. Carta, G. Ferellec, P. Maurer Game Art : J. Loosveld, J.-P. Putod, A. Tanguy Music & Sound Design : R.-P. Maisonnave

Enjoy the experience of a rogue-like game on your motor bike! The player is on a procedurally generated road. He fights enemies with a lot of weapons.
